original_text: And although they were seeking to arrest him, they feared the crowds, because they held him to be a prophet.
korean_text: 잡고자 하나 무리를 무서워하니 이는 그들이 예수를 선지자로 앎이었더라

sentences.original_text: And although they were seeking to arrest him
because they held him to be a prophet
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들은 그를 선지자로 여겼기 때문입니다
